        <api_name>global.WFWorkSpaceTagUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>This script isused workspaces to get knowledge Articles.</description>
        <name>WFWorkSpaceTagUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WFWorkSpaceTagUtil = Class.create();
WFWorkSpaceTagUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
verifyingtags:function(){
		var tagdetails = this.getTagSysId(gs.getUserDisplayName());
		if(tagdetails != null && tagdetails != undefined)
			return this.getrecordkeys(tagdetails);
		else 
			return null;
},
getTagSysId: function(tagName) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('label');
		gr.addQuery('name', tagName);
		gr.query();
		return gr.next() ? gr.sys_id + '' : null;		
},
getrecordkeys:function(tagSysId){
		var taggedRecords = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord('label_entry');		
		gr.addQuery('label', tagSysId);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			taggedRecords.push(gr.getValue('table_key'));
		}
		return taggedRecords;
},
    type: 'WFWorkSpaceTagUtil'
});]]></script>
